actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in Los Angeles County in the State of California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in Los Angeles County in the State of California. Directs the Secretary to provide for the care and maintenance of such national cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in Los Angeles County in the State of California.
